name: Little Spaceship-2
description:
This newer version of the game is more

fun to play, with new mechanics, like:

Customizable Spaceships, New Controllers,  and more Enemies

BQK dev: If you can please download it and try it, it will help me so much. Details of the game

This game was made to see my potential 

of makings games that have more advanced code

The game was made with the program Godot

I learn new things with this project.

Specials Thanks

This project would be made with the help of:

Enrique Hernandez Cuellar, and Kevyn Hernandez Cuellar

Want More?

you can either visit my website.

On my website, the games release more early and also you can get an Email every time there is a new game.

Thanks for Playing
